metadata.title: CVE-2020-1950 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A carefully crafted or corrupt PSD file can cause excessive memory usage inApache Tika's PSDParser in versions 1.0-1.23.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtika-java - 1.5-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tika package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-4ubuntu0.1').
